# kAudioUnitGetPropertyInfoSelect

**Global Variable**

Used by the system to get property information from an audio unit when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitGetPropertyInfo(_:_:_:_:_:_:)] function.

## Declaration

```swift
var kAudioUnitGetPropertyInfoSelect: Int { get }
```

## Constants

- **kAudioUnitAddPropertyListenerSelect**: Used by the system to register a property listener callback function for an audio unit when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitAddPropertyListener(_:_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitAddRenderNotifySelect**
- **kAudioUnitComplexRenderSelect**
- **kAudioUnitGetParameterSelect**: Used by the system to get the current value of an audio unit parameter when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitGetParameter(_:_:_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitGetPropertySelect**
- **kAudioUnitInitializeSelect**
- **kAudioUnitProcessMultipleSelect**
- **kAudioUnitProcessSelect**
- **kAudioUnitRange**
- **kAudioUnitRemovePropertyListenerSelect**: Used by the system to unregister a property listener callback function from an audio unit when you call the `AudioUnitRemovePropertyListener` function.
- **kAudioUnitRemovePropertyListenerWithUserDataSelect**
- **kAudioUnitRemoveRenderNotifySelect**
- **kAudioUnitRenderSelect**: Used by the system to invoke audio rendering by an audio unit when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitRender(_:_:_:_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitResetSelect**: Used by the system to reset an audio unit when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitReset(_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitScheduleParametersSelect**: Used by the system to schedule an audio unit parameter value change when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitScheduleParameters(_:_:_:)] function.
